title: Worlds 2019 Viewing Party OCE
body: With the Worlds Finals being just about 2 weeks away from now, do we have any idea if there are going to be any cinema hosts for the finals? I went last year with a group of friends and had the best time, and I've been keen to do it again this year, but I haven't seen anything about it posted online yet. Does anyone know if they're going to do this again?

replies.body: I also am wondering the same thing, posted a question as well no one seems to know. Upvote to get popularity and send the message to riot
this is super annoying, ive been looking for 30 minutes everywhere with no luck, wish riot would advertise this more

I don't believe there are any plans for viewing parties this year. They always gave us heaps of notice in the past, so I'd say it's just not happening this year.

Good chance to set up on your or a mate's TV to watch it with friends though! That's what I'm doing :) As much as I love the viewing parties and the hype, I can't discredit the fun and cosiness of a small just mates viewing either.

Anyone know how to get to riot officials
I've tried through support but no one has the "power"
Found this after looking still nothing =/
Also me and my group of mates are super keen!
